long_description: A lightweight running top with mesh panels to keep you cool during warm-weather runs, the Brooks Equilibrium T-shirt takes makes sure you are comfortable so you can focus on training. Lightweight polyester fabric moves moisture away from your skin and dries quickly to keep you comforable; a touch of added spandex allows freedom of movement. Mesh panels under arms increase ventilation to keep you from overheating. Flat seams feel comfortable against skin; reflective highlights increase visibility in low light and can be seen from any angle. The fitted Brooks Equilibrium T-shirt offers a close-to-body fit. Closeout.
short_description: A lightweight running top with mesh panels to keep you cool during warm-weather runs, the Brooks Equilibrium T-shirt takes makes sure you are comfortable so you can focus on training.
